Docs.param: A containing the value to manipulate. This value may be (unlike most other extension methods).
A which will be invoked with as a parameter.
Docs.returns: The value of type returned by .

remarks.para: With is useful for easily using an intermediate value within an expression "chain" without requiring an explicit variable declaration (which is useful for reducing in-scope variables, as no variable is explicitly declared).
